message: Following Ren's instructions, we come to a street lined with extravagant villas.
Even here, there's something of a class system. The buildings range from palatial mansions to smaller, but still nice, houses.
We're staying in one of the latter, a small two-story building at the end of the block.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess this is it..."
Compared to the other buildings, ours looks a bit older.
There's a plate with the word "GLITTER" set above the door.
The neighboring building has a different word above its door, so I assume it's the building's name.
I hold my Coil up to the screen next to the door and turn the old-fashioned doorknob.
When I step inside, my eyes go wide.
The interior looks just as old-fashioned as the place did from the outside.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's kinda... retro."

name: ノイズ
message: "...I'm not a fan."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Do I look like a fucking geezer to you?"
Noiz's crude remark draws my attention. I notice that his expression has changed slightly.
Is that... disgust?
I feel a twinge of curiosity, but decide to ignore it and check out the house.
The first floor has a large clock and lots of expensive-looking furniture. There are stairs heading up to the second floor in the back.
Noiz plops down on the couch while I'm looking around.
And then, he suddenly holds out his hand.

name: ノイズ
message: "Gimme your Coil."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Hand it over."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why?"

name: ノイズ
message: "So I can figure out who sent that invitation. It'll make our job a lot easier if it's connected to Toue somehow."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Toue? Why Toue?"

name: ノイズ
message: "He owns Platinum Jail. Good chance he was the one pulling the strings to get you here."
He does have a point, but I'm still not sure I can trust him.
Couldn't he just be using this as an excuse to steal my data?
I mean, that wouldn't be hard for him.

name: ノイズ
message: "What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nothing."

name: ノイズ
message: "What? You think I'm gonna steal your identity or something? Why would I do that? Besides, you think I need your Coil for that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You little..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Just give it up already."
Overwhelmed by his brazen attitude, I reluctantly toss Noiz my Coil.
He catches it and hooks it to his own Coil.
Then he starts tapping away with incredible speed, eyes easily following the torrent of data on his screen.
...Damn.
I like to think I'm reasonably competent with tech, but I'm nowhere near his level.
The look of intense concentration on his face gives him this impenetrable aura...
I watch him, secretly impressed, for a while... until suddenly, he stops.

name: ノイズ
message: "...I don't believe this shit."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Something wrong?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I keep getting errors, no matter what I try. I've never seen government networks locked up this tight. I dunno if it's Toue we're dealing with..."

name: ノイズ
message: "But whoever it is is blacker than black. It might really be a trap."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Seriously?"
But what does that mean?
Noiz throws my Coil back to me.

name: ノイズ
message: "Well, just be careful. Clearly something's after you. There'll probably be more ganking attempts too."
Gankings, huh...
I know Noiz was the rabbit-head, but the second one was someone else entirely.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Can anyone do that ganking thing?"

name: ノイズ
message: "It's a piece of cake if you've got a little knowledge and skill. Anyone could manage it. Even you. ...Actually."
Noiz stops mid-sentence and examines my face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: ノイズ
message: "You didn't know that? I thought you used to battle. Usui only became a thing and started enforcing rules about six, seven years ago.

name: ノイズ
message: "When you were into Rhyme... What? Ten or so years ago? Ganking was the norm back then."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fuck if I know. I don't remember any of that."
Noiz closes his mouth and glares at me.

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm sick of looking at that slack-jawed expression of yours. Like you don't get a fucking thing."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Excuse me?!"
Noiz gets up and heads upstairs without another word.
I'm so taken aback that I just watch him walk off.
...But as time passes, I start to feel pissed off.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I sure as hell don't get him, that's for sure."
Frustrated, I throw myself onto the couch and take Ren out of my bag.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where's he get off looking down on me, huh? It's like the guy has no self-control at all. Doesn't think about anyone but himself."

name: 蓮
message: "I do agree that his intentions are difficult to grasp."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Right? I dunno, maybe I'm the problem or something, but I wish he'd be a little more considerate, y'know?"
While complaining, I start to feel myself sinking into the cushions.
The couch is so comfortable... I'm getting sleepy.
Come to think of it, I've been running basically non-stop since we left the Old Residential District...
I should get some rest...
So tired...
Unable to fight the drowsiness that's crept up on me, I slowly close my eyes.
